DOC.brief_summary: Study time usage anesthesia team inside main operating room compare 2 group - Performing regional anesthesia inside operating room - Performing regional anesthesia block room Study purpose : How much investigator save time main operating room perform regional anesthesia block room ?
DOC.brief_title: Can Usage Regional Block Room Save Time Anesthesia Team
DOC.detailed_description: Anesthesia-controlled time mean anesthesia pre-procedure time plus anesthesia post-procedure time . We also compare anesthesia-controlled time 3 group - general anesthesia - regional anesthesia - general anesthesia combine regional anesthesia
DOC.criteria: elective orthopedic surgical patient require anesthesia ( start 9AM4PM ) surgery local infiltration
